verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Ye servants of God, your Master proclaim, newline And publish abroad His wonderful name; newline The name all victorious, of Jesus extol, newline His kingdom is glorious, He rules over all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: God ruleth on high, almighty to save, newline And still He is nigh, His presence we have; newline The great congregation His triumph shall sing, newline Ascribing salvation to Jesus our King.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Salvation to God who sits on the throne, newline Let all cry aloud and honor the Son; newline The praises of Jesus the angels proclaim; newline Fall down on their faces and worship the Lamb.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Then let us adore and give Him His right; newline All glory and pow'r all wisdom and might. newline All honor and blessing with angels above, newline And thanks never ceasing and infinite love. newline Amen.
